author: China Uncensored
description:
Operation Honey Pot: Paste this emoji 🍯 in your comment below.
Turns out, the U.S. government didn’t just allow American tech companies to help China’s surveillance state—it encouraged them. From cloud loopholes to direct connections with China’s security agencies, Washington’s fingerprints are all over the CCP’s spy machine.

Want to go deeper than YouTube will let us? Check out our website: https://chinauncensored.tv

title: The U.S. Government HELPED Build China’s Police State
